page.title: 01TYNE VALLEY-WYLAM TO RYTON.
page.content: {RIVER TYNE. The section of the{River Tyne}which runs through our block is largely used for recreational purposes. People use it for{canoeing, water skiing}and {sailing,}as well as for{fishing.}A number of different types of fish are caught and these include:salmon,sea trout,brown trout, eels, perch and dace. {HOUSING. There are three main areas of housing and one small village in our block.The main areas are at{Ryton, {Heddon-on-the- Wall}and{Throckley, with a much smaller village at{Clara- {Vale. {LAND USE. Much of the land is used for {farming}or recreational purposes.There are in fact two 18 hole and one 9 hole {golf courses}within our block.
